title: Industrials Up On Trade-Deal Bets — Industrials Roundup
text:
Shares of industrial and transportation companies rose after reports that China was open to signing a limited trade deal with the U.S.

The sector held gains after minutes from the Federal Reserve's September meeting showed the rate-setting board anticipated a "persistent drag" on the manufacturing sector from tariffs, bearish views that were interpreted as heightening the odds of a rate cut in October.

The Defence and Space group of Airbus is being asked to save money in the final quarter of the year, in order to meet targets, Reuters reported.

Write to Rob Curran at rob.curran@dowjones.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 09, 2019 16:22 ET (20:22 GMT)
